text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that under Article 3 of the Regulatory Reform (Fire Safety) Order 2005, the responsible person is defined as (a) the employer if the workplace is under their control, (b) the person in control of the premises for business purposes, or (c) the owner if no one else has such control.
